statements: SELECT * FROM competitor_patents ORDER BY patent_filing_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, competitor_name, industry_sector FROM competitor_patents WHERE competitor_name = 'Apple'
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, competitor_name, industry_sector, patent_description FROM competitor_patents WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY patent_filing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE patent_filing_date >= '2022-01-01' AND patent_filing_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT competitor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM competitor_patents GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY total_patents DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY patent_filing_date DESC;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, competitor_name FROM competitor_patents WHERE industry_sector = 'Healthcare' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT DISTINCT competitor_name, COUNT(*) AS patent_count FROM competitor_patents GROUP BY competitor_name ORDER BY patent_count DESC;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, industry_sector FROM competitor_patents WHERE competitor_name = 'Acme Corp' AND patent_filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE patent_description LIKE '%innovative%' ORDER BY patent_filing_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents;
SELECT patent_name, publication_date FROM competitor_patents WHERE company_name='Company A';
SELECT strategy_name, execution_date FROM pharmaceutical_strategies WHERE description LIKE '%innovation%';
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) as patent_count FROM competitor_patents GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT patent_name, publication_date, company_name FROM competitor_patents WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE company_name = 'Company A' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, description, execution_date FROM pharmaceutical_strategies WHERE execution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT company_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS patent_count FROM competitor_patents GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY patent_count DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, LENGTH(description) AS description_length FROM pharmaceutical_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPatents;
SELECT patent_name, competitor_name FROM CompetitorPatents WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT competitor_name, patent_name, publication_date FROM CompetitorPatents ORDER BY competitor_name ASC;
SELECT infringement_id, patent_id, infringement_date FROM PatentInfringements WHERE legal_action_taken = 'lawsuit';
SELECT analysis_id, market_trend, analysis_date FROM MarketAnalysis ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CompetitorPatents;
SELECT patent_name, competitor_name FROM CompetitorPatents WHERE competitor_name='Company A';
SELECT patent_name, publication_date FROM CompetitorPatents ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PatentInfringements WHERE infringement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT analysis_id, market_trend FROM MarketAnalysis WHERE analysis_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_title, publication_date FROM patents WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT company_name, headquarters_address FROM companies;
SELECT owner_name, contact_email, company_id FROM patent_owners WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM patent_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents
SELECT company_name, publication_date FROM patents ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT company_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS patent_count FROM patents GROUP BY company_name HAVING patent_count > 1
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies INNER JOIN patent_owners ON companies.company_id = patent_owners.company_id
SELECT owner_name, contact_email FROM patent_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, industry_sector FROM competitor_patents;
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY patent_id DESC;
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_company, patent_name, patent_owner FROM patent_inventors INNER JOIN competitor_patents ON patent_inventors.patent_id = competitor_patents.patent_id;
SELECT MAX(file_size) AS largest_file_size FROM patent_files;
SELECT citation_date, citing_patent_id, cited_patent_id FROM patent_citations WHERE citation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM competitor_patents WHERE industry_sector = 'Technology';
SELECT patent_name, patent_description FROM competitor_patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Company A';
SELECT patent_id, patent_owner, industry_sector FROM competitor_patents ORDER BY patent_owner DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT industry_sector FROM competitor_patents;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM competitor_patents;
